title: This actually made my day.
body: I wanted to know what the unexplained magic damage was coming from Garen in the death recap, so i put my curser over it and in the explanation box all it said was iamGAREN, i just cracked up solidly and thought "fair enough man! you're Garen thats all the explanation that is ever needed!" xD

replies.body:
I had one that said YAGAMILight when gnar killed me

and another when lulu killed me saying "LittlePurPleBall"
Id be terrified if it told me i was liked by Light Yagami hahaha especially if it was a karthus with his little black book.
Karthus is Yagami after he ascends (if he did) ;)

Yagami is stuck in limbo, that was explained in like the second/third episode

"Anyone that has used the notebook can neither go to heaven nor hell for eternity"
In limbo or not (and the Shinigami realm could indeed be classified as such) the generally accepted myth is that the un-named Shinigami in the Re-light specials is the reincarnation of Light Yagami.

I meant that as is "He becomes a death god" sorry for the confusion :?

(´◔ω◔)っ由 haz a sorry gift
Ahah that's a cool eater egg :D The unexplained magic damage was judgement's mixed damage due to the passive on his ult BTW.

ahhh ok thanks i was wondering haha xD
but i laughed when i saw this aye :p
we should make new accs after champs lol
